contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1953 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Test Piece Contest
Bianca e Fernando
Victoria Park, Holmfirth March contest 1st Hade Edge, 2nd Birdwell. Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £15, 3rd £10, 4th £6, 5th £4. 11 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 8:58 p.m. March 25, 2019, 1:59 p.m.
1 Birdwell Brass Winston Moore
2 Hade Edge Albert Robinson
3 Houghton Main Colliery Herbert Boothroyd
4 Slaithwaite Band Alex Mortimer
5 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band Gordon Roberts
